effect_entries.effect: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.
When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
